etomica.normalmode

Class MeterNormalMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.MeterNormalMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, java.io.Serializable

    public class MeterNormalMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource, IAction, java.io.Serializable
    Calculates the S-matrix for a configuration. This matrix is formed as T(k) T^(-k), where T is the collective generalized-coordinate vector.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public IData getData()
